mean_en: to burst or make something burst loudly and violently, causing damage; to increase suddenly and very quickly in number; to suddenly express an emotion;
sentence: If a light bulb explodes, it is very dangerous to be nearby.
sentence_trans: 如果灯泡爆炸了，在那附近是非常危险的。
word_etyma: ex出 + plode爆炸声 → 发出爆炸声 → explode爆炸
